Detailed Description

Contains information of a single wxPropertyGrid page.

Member Function Documentation

wxPGProperty* wxPropertyGridState::NewProperty (  const wxString &  label,
const wxString &  name,
wxVariant &  value
)  const
 

Creates a new property.

Type is detected from wxVariant value.

Remarks:
It is important to detect that the return value is not NULL (which usually is if type in variant was not registered).
